messages.are-you-sure-to-delete: Are you sure that you want to delete this item?

models.o3-description: O3 employs a machine learning technique - constantly trained on evidence data - to predict the exposure

es.name: Name
es.models-info: At least one exposure model should be configured for the exposure assessment. Click on a given model to access its input parameters.
es.none-tooltip: Generic exposure situation that is not related to any chemical
es.none-info: The results will not include the risk evaluation (comparison of the exposure concentration with a corresponding toxicological value of substance)

alerts.field-no-option: Please check if you have provided values for all fields above

art.nf: Source distance 1m or less from worker's breathing zone (nose and mouth)
art.building: Exposure source distanced far from building
art.ff-distance: Worker distanced more than 4 meters from far-field source

sm.abrasion: Situation concerns shaping of solid objects by removing or cutting
sm.nf: Less than 1 meter between the exposure source and employee's breathing zone
sm.ff1: More than one employee carrying out the same task simultaneously

art.wetting: Wetting at the point of release
art.mechanical: Mechanical ventilation giving at least 1 ACH
art.specialized: Specialized room ventilation with more than 10 ACH

sm.hl-spraying2: Handling of liquids at high pressure resulting in substantial generation of mist or spray/haze
sm.hl-spraying1: Handling of liquids using low pressure but high speed without creating mist or spray/haze
sm.hl-surfaces3: Handling of liquids on large surfaces or large work pieces
sm.hl-surfaces2: Handling of liquids using low pressure, low speed and on medium-sized surfaces
sm.hl-surfaces1: Handling of liquids at small surfaces or incidental handling of liquids
sm.hl-small: Handling where only small amounts of liquid may be released
sm.hl-closed: Handling of liquids in tightly closed containers
sm.hp-large2: Handling very large amounts of product
sm.hp-large1: Handling or treatment of objects, where due to high pressure, speed or high force large quantities of dust are generated
sm.hp-dispersion: Handling of products that may lead to some dispersion of dust
sm.hp-medium: Handling of products with low speed or with little force in medium quantities
sm.hp-small: Handling of products in small amounts or in situation
sm.hp-very-small: Handling of products in very small amounts
sm.hp-negligible: Handling of products in negligible amounts
sm.hp-closed: Handling of products in closed containers
sm.hw-mechanical-fine: Mechanical handling of wood resulting in fine dust
sm.hw-mechanical-coarse: Mechanical handling of wood resulting in coarse dust
sm.hw-low-mechanical: Low energy mechanical handling of wood resulting in less dust
sm.hs-sanding: Mechanical sawing and sanding of stone
sm.hs-demolition: Mechanical handling and demolition of stone products
sm.hs-low-energy2: Low energy mechanical handling of stone
sm.hs-low-energy1: Low energy mechanical handling of stone resulting in less dust
sm.suppression: Use of product that reduces the emission
sm.containment-lev: Containment of the source with LEV
sm.mechanical: General ventilation (mechanical or open door(s) and windows)
sm.no-cabin: The worker does not work in a cabin
sm.cabin: The worker works in a cabin without a specific ventilation
sm.separated: The worker is in a separated (control) room with independent air supply

ecetoc.proc1: PROC1: Chemical production or refinery in closed process without likelihood of exposure or processes with equivalent containment conditions
ecetoc.proc2: PROC2: Chemical production or refinery in closed continuous process with occasional controlled exposure or processes with equivalent containment conditions
ecetoc.proc3: PROC3: Manufacture or formulation in the chemical industry in closed batch processes with occasional controlled exposure or processes with equivalent containment condition
ecetoc.proc4: PROC4: Chemical production where opportunity for exposure arises
ecetoc.proc5: PROC5: Mixing or blending in batch processes
ecetoc.proc8a: PROC8a: Transfer of substance or mixture (charging and discharging) at non-dedicated facilities
ecetoc.proc8b: PROC8b: Transfer of substance or mixture (charging and discharging) at dedicated facilities
ecetoc.proc9: PROC9: Transfer of substance or mixture into small containers (dedicated filling line, including weighing)
ecetoc.proc12: PROC12: Use of blowing agents in manufacture of foam
ecetoc.proc13: PROC13: Treatment of articles by dipping and pouring
ecetoc.proc14: PROC14: Tableting, compression, extrusion, pelletization, granulation
ecetoc.proc17: PROC17: Lubrication at high energy conditions in metal working operations
ecetoc.proc18: PROC18: General greasing /lubrication at high kinetic energy conditions
ecetoc.proc19: PROC19: Manual activities involving hand contact
ecetoc.proc20: PROC20: Use of functional fluids in small devices
ecetoc.proc21: PROC21: Low energy manipulation and handling of substances bound in/on materials or articles
ecetoc.proc22: PROC22: Manufacturing and processing of minerals and/or metals at substantially elevated temperature
ecetoc.proc23: PROC23: Open processing and transfer operations at substantially elevated temperature
ecetoc.proc24: PROC24: High (mechanical) energy work-up of substances bound in /on materials and/or articles
ecetoc.proc25: PROC25: Other hot work operations with metals
ecetoc.gv-lev: Indoors with good general ventilation and LEV
ecetoc.egv-lev: Indoors with enhanced general ventilation and LEV
